scripts.convert-mp4: for i in ../video/*.mov; do f=`basename $i .mov`; ffmpeg -i $i -an "public/cinemagraphs/$f.mp4" -map_metadata -1 -qscale 0; done
scripts.convert-webm: for i in ../video/*.mov; do f=`basename $i .mov`; ffmpeg -i $i -an "public/cinemagraphs/$f.webm" -map_metadata -1 -f webm -c:v libvpx -b:v 1M -hide_banner; done
